member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category
member.summary: A forum category acts as a container to group logically different forums.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.SiteId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Site which the Forum Category belongs to.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Name
member.summary: The name of the Forum Category which is displayed in the index page.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.SortOrder
member.summary: The sort order which is used to display the Forum Categories in the index page.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.TopicsCount
member.summary: The number of topics of all forums within the forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.RepliesCount
member.summary: The number of replies of all forums within the forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Status
member.summary: The status of the forum category. Can be either published or deleted.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.PermissionSetId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Permission Set used as default for all Forums within the Forum Category which do not specify a Permission Set.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Site
member.summary: Reference to the Site the Forum Category belongs to.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.PermissionSet
member.summary: Reference to Permission Set used for the Forum Category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Forums
member.summary: List of Forums that belong to the Forum Category.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty forum category.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.#ctor(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.String,System.Int32,System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates a new forum category with the given values including a unique identifier. The default status is published.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.#ctor(System.Guid,System.String,System.Int32,System.Guid)
member.summary: Creates a new forum category with the given values. The unique identifier is automatically assigned. The default status is published.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.UpdateDetails(System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Updates the details of the forum category. The values that can be changed are name and permission set.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.MoveUp
member.summary: Change the sort order by moving up 1 position. It generates an error if sort order is 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.MoveDown
member.summary: Change the sort order by moving down 1 position.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Reorder(System.Int32)
member.summary: Replace the sort order with the given value.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.IncreaseTopicsCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Increase the number of topics by the given value. If no value is given it will increase by 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.IncreaseRepliesCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Increase the number of replies by the given value. If no value is given it will increase by 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.DecreaseTopicsCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrease the number of topics by the given value. If no value is given it will decrease by 1. If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.DecreaseRepliesCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrease the number of replies by the given value. If no value is given it will decrease by 1. If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.Delete
member.summary: Set the status as deleted. Forums, topics and replies within the forum category will no longer be visible.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Categories.Category.PermissionSetName
member.summary: Returns the name of permission set used.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.CreateCategory
member.summary: Request that creates a new Forum Category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.CreateCategory.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier for the new Forum Category. If not specified, a random one is assigned.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.CreateCategory.Name
member.summary: The name for the Forum Category. This value is mandatory.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.CreateCategory.PermissionSetId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Permission Set used os default for all Forums within the Forum Category. This value is mandatory.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.DeleteCategory
member.summary: Request that deletes a Forum Category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.DeleteCategory.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category to delete.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.MoveCategory
member.summary: Request that changes the sort order of a forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.MoveCategory.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum category to move.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.MoveCategory.Direction
member.summary: The direction. Can be either up or down.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.UpdateCategory
member.summary: Request that updates a forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.UpdateCategory.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum category to update.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.UpdateCategory.Name
member.summary: The new name of the forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Categories.Commands.UpdateCategory.PermissionSetId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the new permission set for the forum category.

member.summary: CommandBase

member.summary: The unique identifier of the Site whose the request belongs to.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.CommandBase.UserId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the User who initiated the request.

member.summary: Request that creates a forum section.

member.summary: The unique identifier for the new forum. If not specified, a random one is assigned.

member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum category which the new forum belongs to.

member.summary: The name of the new forum.

member.summary: The slug for the new forum.

member.summary: The description of the new forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.CreateForum.PermissionSetId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the permission set. If not assigned, the new forum will inherit the permission set from the forum category.

member.summary: Request that deletes a forum.

member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum to delete.

member.summary: Request that changes the sort order of a forum.

member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum to move.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.MoveForum.Direction
member.summary: The direction. Can be either up or down.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum
member.summary: Request that updates the forum details.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum to update.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum.CategoryId
member.summary: The new forum category for the forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum.Name
member.summary: The new name of the forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum.Slug
member.summary: The new slug of the forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum.Description
member.summary: The new description of the forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Commands.UpdateForum.PermissionSetId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the new permission set for the forum.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum
member.summary: A forum is a board where users can hold conversations.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.CategoryId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the Forum Category which the Forum belongs to.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Name
member.summary: The name of the Forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Slug
member.summary: The Slug of the Forum. This value is added to the URL in order to identify the Forum. If the Slug is "my-forum-slug", the URL will be something similar to "www.mysite.com/forum/my-forum-slug".

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Description
member.summary: The description of the Forum. This value will be displayed in the index and forum pages if included in the theme.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.SortOrder
member.summary: The sort order which is used to display the forums in the index page.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.TopicsCount
member.summary: The number of topics published.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.RepliesCount
member.summary: The number of replies published.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Status
member.summary: The status of the forum. Can be either published or deleted.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.PermissionSetId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the permission set used. If it's not assigned, the forum will inherit the permission set fom the forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.LastPostId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the last post published.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Category
member.summary: Reference to the forum category.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.PermissionSet
member.summary: Reference to the permission set if assigned.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.LastPost
member.summary: Reference to the last post published if any.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Posts
member.summary: List of published posts.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.#ctor
member.summary: Create an empty forum.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.#ctor(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Create a new forum with the given values including a unique identifier. The default status is published.

member.summary: Creates a new forum with the given values. The unique identifier is automatically assigned. The default status is published.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.UpdateDetails(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Updates the details of the forum. The values that can be changed are forum category, name, slug, description and permission set.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.UpdateLastPost(System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Updates the unique identifier of the last published post.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.MoveUp
member.summary: Change the sort order by moving up 1 position. It generates an error if sort order is 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.MoveDown
member.summary: Change the sort order by moving down 1 position.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Reorder(System.Int32)
member.summary: Replace the sort order with the given value.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.IncreaseTopicsCount
member.summary: Increase the number of topics by 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.DecreaseTopicsCount
member.summary: Decrease the number of topics by 1. If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.IncreaseRepliesCount
member.summary: Increase the number of replies by 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.DecreaseRepliesCount
member.summary: Decrease the number of replies by 1. If the resulting number is less than zero, the value will be set to zero.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Forums.Forum.Delete
member.summary: Set the status as deleted. Topics and replies within the forum will no longer be visible.

member.summary: Returns the name of permission set if assigned.

member.summary: Indicates if a permission set is assigned.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet
member.summary: A permission set contains the permissions to read, create or edit forum posts. Each permission type such as view forum, read topics or create new posts is assigned to one or more user roles.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the permission set.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.SiteId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the site which the permission set belongs to.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Name
member.summary: The name of the permission set.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Status
member.summary: The status of the permission set. It could be either published or deleted.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Permissions
member.summary: List of permissions. Each permission is a combination of a user role and a permission type. For example, role Subscriber and type Read which means that only users in the role Subscriber can read the discussions.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Categories
member.summary: List of forum categories that use the permission set.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Forums
member.summary: List of forums that use the permission set.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty permission set.

member.summary: Creates a new permission set with the given values. The unique identifier is automatically assigned. The default status is published.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.#ctor(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.Commands.PermissionCommand})
member.summary: Creates a new permission set with the given values including a unique identifier. The default status is published.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.UpdateDetails(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.Commands.PermissionCommand})
member.summary: Updates the details of the permission set. The values that can be changed are name and permissions.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.PermissionSets.PermissionSet.Delete
member.summary: Set the status as deleted. The permission set can no longer be used in forum categories and forums.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Commands.UpdateTopic.Slug

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post
member.summary: A forum post is a message created in a forum. It can be either the start of a discussion (topic) or a reply to another message.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum post.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.ForumId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Title
member.summary: The title of the post. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Slug
member.summary: The slug of the post. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic). This value is added to the URL in order to identify the topic within the forum. If the slug is "my-topic-slug", the URL will be something similar to "www.mysite.com/forum/my-forum/my-topic-slug".

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Content
member.summary: The content of the post.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.RepliesCount
member.summary: The number of replies to the initial message. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Status
member.summary: The status of the post. It can be either published or deleted.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.CreatedBy
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user who created the post.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.CreatedOn
member.summary: The time stamp of when the post has been created.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.ModifiedBy
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user who last updated the post.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.ModifiedOn
member.summary: The time stamp of when the post has been last updated.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Pinned
member.summary: Value indicating whether the post is pinned or not. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic). If pinned, the topic is always shown at the top of the forum page.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Locked
member.summary: Value indicating whether the post is locked or not. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic). If locked, only users that can moderate a forum will be able to reply to the initial message.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.IsAnswer
member.summary: Value indicating whether the post is marked as answer or not. It is only used if the post is a reply to the initial message. If it is an answer, the post is shown at the top of the topic page and marked as the accepted answer.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.HasAnswer
member.summary: Value indicating whether the post has an answer or not. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic). If it has an answer, the topic is marked as answered in the forum page.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.TopicId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the topic. It is only used if the post is a reply to the initial message.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.LastReplyId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the last reply. It is only used if the post is the initial message (topic).

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Topic
member.summary: Reference to the topic.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.LastReply
member.summary: Reference to the last reply.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Forum
member.summary: Reference to the forum.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.CreatedByUser
member.summary: Reference to the user who created the post.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.ModifiedByUser
member.summary: Reference to the user who last updated the post.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty forum post.

member.summary: Creates a new topic with the given values.

member.summary: Creates a new topic with the given values including the unique identifier.

member.summary: Creates a new reply with the given values.

member.summary: Creates a new reply with the given values including the unique identifier.

member.summary: Updates the details of the topic.

member.summary: Updates the details of the reply.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.UpdateLastReply(System.Guid)
member.summary: Updates the last reply unique identifier if the post is the initial message.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.IncreaseRepliesCount
member.summary: Increases the number of replies of the topic by 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.DecreaseRepliesCount
member.summary: Decreases the number of replies of the topic by 1. If the resulting number is less than zero, the value is set to zero.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Pin(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pin and unpin the topic based of the passed value.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Lock(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lock and unlock the topic based of the passed value.

member.summary: Set the reply as answer.

member.summary: Set the topic as answered.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.Delete
member.summary: Set the status as deleted.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Posts.Post.IsTopic
member.summary: Indicates if the post is an initial message (topic).

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.ConfirmUser
member.summary: Request to set the status of a user to active after the email has been confirmed.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.ConfirmUser.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.CreateUser
member.summary: Request to create a new user. This request is sent right after a user completes the registration in the site. If a user is already registered but a profile does not exist yet, this request is sent the first time the user logs in.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.CreateUser.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.CreateUser.IdentityUserId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user in the membership database.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.CreateUser.Email
member.summary: The email of the user in the membership database.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.CreateUser.Confirm
member.summary: A value indicating whether the status of the new user needs to be set as active (true) or pending (false). When a user registers through the site the value is false because the user needs to confirm the email address before being set as active. When an administrator creates a user through the admin are, this value is true and the user is immediately active.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.DeleteUser
member.summary: Request to set the status of a user to deleted and to remove the identity user from the membership database.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.DeleteUser.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user to delete.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.ReinstateUser
member.summary: Request to re-active a suspended user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.ReinstateUser.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user to re-activate.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.SuspendUser
member.summary: Request to suspend a user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.SuspendUser.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user to be suspended.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.UpdateUser
member.summary: Request to update a user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.UpdateUser.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user to update.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.UpdateUser.DisplayName
member.summary: The new display name of the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.Commands.UpdateUser.Roles
member.summary: The list of roles to be assigned to the user. This value is populated only an administrator updates a user.

member.name: T:Atles.Domain.Users.User
member.summary: User

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.IdentityUserId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user in the membership database.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.Email
member.summary: The email of the user in the membership database.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.DisplayName
member.summary: The display name of the user. It is used as the public name of the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.TopicsCount
member.summary: The number of the topics published by the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.RepliesCount
member.summary: The number of replies created by the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.Status
member.summary:
The status of the user.
Pending: User is registered but the email is not confirmed.
Active: User is registered and the email is confirmed.
Suspended: User cannot create new posts (topics or replies).

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.TimeStamp
member.summary: The time stamp of when the user has been created.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.Posts
member.summary: The list of posts created by the user.

member.name: P:Atles.Domain.Users.User.Events
member.summary: The list of events generated by the user.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Users.User.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty user.

member.summary: Creates a new user with the given values.

member.summary: Creates a new user with the given values including the unique identifier.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Users.User.Confirm
member.summary: Set the status to active when the user confirms the email address.

member.summary: Updates user's details.

member.summary: Increases the number of topics by 1.

member.summary: Increases the number of replies by 1.

member.summary: Decreases the number of topics by 1.

member.name: M:Atles.Domain.Users.User.DecreaseRepliesCount
member.summary: Decreases the number of replies by 1.

member.summary: Sets the status of the user as suspended. The user will no longer be able to write new posts.
